name: MSCRMGetSolution
description: Retrieves solution details from a CRM instance
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: crmConnectionString
inputs.label: CRM Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: For more information on format check the [docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect)

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the solution you want to check

inputs.name: crmConnectionTimeout
inputs.label: Crm Connection Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Crm connection timeout in seconds

inputs.name: existsVariableName
inputs.label: Exists Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with true if solution exists

inputs.name: versionVariableName
inputs.label: Version Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with solution version

inputs.name: displayVariableName
inputs.label: Display Name Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with solution display name

OutputVariables.name: SOLUTION_EXISTS
OutputVariables.description: Returns true if the solution exists

OutputVariables.name: SOLUTION_DISPLAY_NAME
OutputVariables.description: The display name of the solution
